meanings.definition: A fact or condition connected with or relevant to an event or action.
meanings.sent1: In some circumstances, it is best to ask for help.
meanings.sent2: The circumstances of the accident were unclear.
meanings.sent3: The circumstances of the missing cookie investigation were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Under the circumstances, her decision to leave seemed inevitable.
meanings.sent5: The circumstances of the storm made it impossible to go outside.

meanings.definition: The way in which something happens or is done; a situation.
meanings.sent1: We must adapt to the circumstances to succeed.
meanings.sent2: The circumstances of their meeting were unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The circumstances of the cat chasing its tail were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: In the circumstances of a busy city, finding peace can be challenging.
meanings.sent5: The circumstances of the play made it thrilling to watch.

meanings.definition: The conditions or facts that are connected with and affect a situation.
meanings.sent1: Consider all circumstances before making a decision.
meanings.sent2: The circumstances of the experiment were carefully controlled.
meanings.sent3: The circumstances of the penguin trying to fly were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: In the circumstances of a heatwave, staying cool is crucial.
meanings.sent5: The circumstances of the negotiation made it difficult to reach an agreement.
